Total high needs block additional high needs funding breakdown
Additional high needs funding Current total
Number of pupils (based on Office for National Statistics population projection of pupils aged 2 to 18) 48,568
Total additional high needs funding £534,296
More about additional high needs funding

We have made an allocation to local authorities of £125 million on the basis of Office of National Statistics’ projections of the population aged 2 to 18 for mid-2020 in each local authority.

Get more information on these calculations from the DSG: technical note 2020 to 2021.
